table_description: GitHub Teams in a given organization. GitHub Teams are groups of organization members that reflect your company or group's structure with cascading access permissions and mentions.

columns.name: organization
columns.description: The organization the team is associated with.

columns.name: slug
columns.description: The team slug name.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the team.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the team.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: The node id of the team.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the team.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when team was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when team was last updated.

columns.name: combined_slug
columns.description: The slug corresponding to the organization and the team.

columns.name: parent_team
columns.description: The teams parent team.

columns.name: privacy
columns.description: The privacy setting of the team (VISIBLE or SECRET).

columns.name: ancestors_total_count
columns.description: Count of ancestors this team has.

columns.name: child_teams_total_count
columns.description: Count of children teams this team has.

columns.name: discussions_total_count
columns.description: Count of team discussions.

columns.name: invitations_total_count
columns.description: Count of outstanding team member invitations for the team.

columns.name: members_total_count
columns.description: Count of team members.

columns.name: projects_v2_total_count
columns.description: Count of the teams v2 projects.

columns.name: repositories_total_count
columns.description: Count of repositories the team has.

columns.name: url
columns.description: URL for the team page in GitHub.

columns.name: avatar_url
columns.description: URL for teams avatar.

columns.name: discussions_url
columns.description: URL for team discussions.

columns.name: edit_team_url
columns.description: URL for editing this team.

columns.name: members_url
columns.description: URL for team members.

columns.name: new_team_url
columns.description: The HTTP URL creating a new team.

columns.name: repositories_url
columns.description: URL for team repositories.

columns.name: teams_url
columns.description: URL for this team's teams.

columns.name: can_administer
columns.description: If true, current user can administer the team.

columns.name: can_subscribe
columns.description: If true, current user can subscribe to the team.

columns.name: subscription
columns.description: Subscription status of the current user to the team.
